articles.headline: Oregon lands No. 1 safety Washington, nephew of Kobe Bryant
articles.description: Four-star prospect Jett Washington, ESPN's No. 1 safety in the 2026 class, announced his commitment to Oregon over Alabama and USC on Thursday night.

articles.headline: Brandon Arrington, No. 1 athlete prospect in 2026, picks Texas A&M
articles.description: Brandon Arrington, the No. 1 athlete prospect and 14th overall recruit in the 2026 ESPN 300, has committed to Texas A&M.

articles.headline: How every five-star college football recruit fits at his new school
articles.description: There are 21 five-stars in the Class of 2026. We look at how they got to their teams and what they'll do in college.

images.name: Chris Henry Jr. [608x342]
images.caption: Chris Henry Jr. committed to Ohio State in July of 2023.

images.name: Keenyi Pepe [800x800]
images.caption: Keenyi Pepe adds another impressive building block to USC's OL class.

articles.byline: Craig Haubert, Eli Lederman and Tom Luginbill

articles.headline: College football recruiting intel: Elite 11 Finals and June's final official visit weekend
articles.description: What we're hearing about one of the most important weekends on the recruiting calendar.

images.name: Landon Duckworth [608x342]
images.caption: Landon Duckworth is one of the top remaining undecided quarterbacks in the Class of 2026.

images.name: Lincoln Riley [608x342]
images.caption: Lincoln Riley's Trojans have the country's deepest recruiting class.

articles.headline: CFP leaders say 'everything's on the table' after meetings wrap
articles.description: CFP executive director Rich Clark said "pretty much everything's on the table" for potential formats for 2026 and beyond but that the group would like to make a decision by the fall.

images.name: Heather Dinich breaks down likelihood of 5+11 CFP format
images.caption: Heather Dinich joins Paul Finebaum to discuss conferences debating whether five automatic bids and 11 at-large ones for 16-team playoff is the future of CFP.

articles.headline: OT Ekene Ogboko, No. 50 in class of '26, commits to Georgia
articles.description: Four-star offensive tackle prospect Ekene Ogboko, No. 50 in the 2026 ESPN 300, has committed to Georgia over Clemson, Florida and Notre Dame, he told ESPN on Wednesday.

images.name: Georgia Bulldogs [600x400]
images.caption: Five-star DT Elijah Griffin has committed to Georgia, turning down Miami and USC.

article.headline: Fagnano and Bell combine for 3 touchdowns in UConn's 47-3 win over Buffalo
article.description: — Joe Fagnano came off the bench to throw three touchdown passes to Skyler Bell and UConn beat Buffalo 47-3 on Saturday.
article.linkText: Fagnano and Bell combine for 3 touchdowns in UConn's 47-3 win over Buffalo

images.name: Skyler Bell grabs his third receiving TD for UConn
images.caption: Skyler Bell sprints 70 yards to the end zone for his second touchdown.

video.headline: Skyler Bell grabs his third receiving TD for UConn
video.caption: Skyler Bell sprints 70 yards to the end zone for his second touchdown.
video.title: Skyler Bell grabs his third receiving TD for UConn
video.description: Skyler Bell sprints 70 yards to the end zone for his second touchdown.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play ( Skyler Bell grabs his third receiving TD for UConn) 2024/09/28 ESHEET

article.story: EAST HARTFORD, Conn. -- — Joe Fagnano came off the bench to throw three touchdown passes to Skyler Bell and UConn beat Buffalo 47-3 on Saturday. Fagnano took over after starting quarterback Nick Evers was sidelined with an injury with nine minutes left in the first half. Fagnano found Bell all alone for a 40-yard touchdown and a 23-0 halftime lead. In the third quarter, Fagnano and Bell combined for 70- and 11-yard touchdowns and Mel Brown weaved his way to a 23-yard rushing score and a 44-3 Huskies (3-2) lead. Fagnano was 11 of 19 for 217 passing yards. Bell made six catches for 153 yards, the first 150-plus-yard receiving game by a UConn receiver since 2019. His three touchdown receptions are the most for the Huskies since Dak Newton had three against Villanova in 1996. Cam Edwards ran for a 43-yard touchdown and finished with 97 yards rushing on 10 carries. Chris Freeman kicked four field goals. The Huskies outgained the Bulls 537-198. Upton Bellenfant got the only points for the Bulls (3-2) with a second-quarter field goal. ------ Get poll alerts and updates on the AP Top 25 throughout the season. Sign up here. AP college football: https://apnews.com/hub/ap-top-25-college-football-poll and https://apnews.com/hub/college-football

videos.headline: Camryn Edwards breaks free for career-long 43-yard UConn TD
videos.description: Camryn Edwards sprints 43 yards for a career-long touchdown, putting UConn on the board against Buffalo.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Camryn Edwards breaks free for career-long 43-yard UConn TD) 2024/09/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Skyler Bell puts his defender in a blender for a UConn TD
videos.description: Skyler Bell shakes off his defender with a slick move, catching a 40-yard touchdown pass from Joe Fagnano to extend UConn's lead.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Skyler Bell puts his defender in a blender for a UConn TD) 2024/09/28 ESHEET

videos.headline: Skyler Bell breaks away for 70-yard UConn TD
videos.description: Skyler Bell sprints 70 yards to the end zone for his second touchdown, extending UConn's lead to 30-3.

tracking.trackingName: NCF_One-Play (Skyler Bell breaks away for 70-yard UConn TD) 2024/09/28 ESHEET
